release.title: OpenSauce Firmware
release.release_notes:
### Experimental firmware for OpenSauce 2025

⚠️ Flash and factory reset to use the latest experimental firmware for OpenSauce 2025.

### Important Notes

 - This firmware is experimental and may not be stable.
 - Use at your own risk.
 - Ensure you have a backup of your current configuration before flashing.
